section.title: Supported File Formats
section.para: A list of formats currently supported by Aten follows as well as the file extensions, assigned filter ID and, if relevant, the revision in which they were introduced. Remember, adding support for other codes is in your hands with Aten's filters system.
section.section:
Model Formats
|| __Format__ | __Extension(s)__ | __Nickname__ | __ID__ | __Read__ | __Write__ | __Trajectory__ | __In Version__ Aten Keyword Format | *.akf | akf | 1 | yes | yes | no | -- Cambridge Structural Database Service | *.dat/*.fdat | csd | 7 | yes | no | -- | -- Crystallographic Information File | *.cif | cif | 8 | yes | no | -- | -- DL_POLY Configurations | *.CONFIG | dlpoly| 2 | yes | yes | yes | -- GAMESS-US Output (Log) | *.log | gamuslog | -- | yes | no | -- | -- GAMESS-US Input | *.inp | gamusinp | 5 | yes | yes | -- | -- Mopac Control File | *.mop | mop | 4 | yes | yes | -- | -- MDL Mol | *.mol | mol | -- | yes | no | -- | -- MSI (Cerius2) Data File | *.msi | msi | -- | yes | no | -- | -- Protein Databank (PDB) | *.pdb | pdb | -- | yes | no | -- | -- SIESTA Flexible Data Format | *.fdf | siesta | 9 | -- | yes | -- | -- Tripos Sybyl Mol2 | *.mol2 | mol2 | 6 | yes | yes | -- | -- XMol XYZ | *.xyz | xyz | 3 | yes | yes | yes | -- ||
!!Grid Formats || __Format__ | __Extension(s)__ | __Nickname__ | __ID__ | __Read__ | __Write__ | __In Version__ Gaussian Cube | *.cube | cube | 1 | yes | no | -- PDens (Custom Format) | *.pdens | pdens | -- | yes | no | -- Surface (Custom Format) | *.surf | surf | -- | yes | no | -- ||
!!Expression Formats || __Format__ | __Extension(s)__ | __Nickname__ | __ID__ | __Read__ | __Write__ | __In Version__ DL_POLY FIELD | *.FIELD, FIELD | dlpoly | 1 | no | yes | --
||
